search.query: eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32ports $wild$ host=$host$ PortItem.process=$process$ PortItem.pid=$pid$ PortItem.path=$path$ PortItem.state=$state$ PortItem.localPort=$localPort$ PortItem.remoteIP=$remoteIP$ | rare limit=100 PortItem.process | eval percent = round(percent,2) | rename host AS Host, PortItem.process as Process, count AS Count, percent AS Percent

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32ports $wild$ host=$host$ PortItem.process=$process$ PortItem.pid=$pid$ PortItem.path=$path$ PortItem.state=$state$ PortItem.localPort=$localPort$ PortItem.remoteIP=$remoteIP$ | rare limit=100 PortItem.path | eval percent = round(percent,2) | rename host AS Host, PortItem.path as Path, count AS Count, percent AS Percent

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32ports $wild$ host=$host$ PortItem.process=$process$ PortItem.pid=$pid$ PortItem.path=$path$ PortItem.state=$state$ PortItem.localPort=$localPort$ PortItem.remoteIP=$remoteIP$ | top limit=100 PortItem.remoteIP | eval percent = round(percent,2) | rename host AS Host, PortItem.remoteIP as "Remote IP", count AS Count, percent AS Percent
